_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Hogwarp
author: imkringle@proton.me
description: A Pterodactyl egg for the Hogwarts Legacy mod Hogwarp - For more info see their Nexus: https://www.nexusmods.com/hogwartslegacy/mods/1378

installation.script:
#Hogwarp Install Script

apt update -y
apt install -y curl file unzip

if [ ! -d /mnt/server ]; then
    mkdir -p /mnt/server/
fi

cd /mnt/server/

# Get version to install
if [ -n $HOGWARP_VERSION ]; then
    ARCHIVE_NAME="Hogwarp-Server-$HOGWARP_VERSION.zip"
    DOWNLOAD_URL+="/${ARCHIVE_NAME}"
else
    ARCHIVE_NAME="Hogwarp-Server-0.6rc1.zip"
    echo "Hogwarp version not set. Defaulting to current latest release."
    DOWNLOAD_URL="https://github.com/ImKringle/Ptero-Things/raw/main/Games-Eggs/Hogwarp/Versions/$ARCHIVE_NAME"
fi

# Validate link
if [ ! -z "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" ]; then 
    if curl --output /dev/null --silent --head --fail ${DOWNLOAD_URL}; then
        echo -e "link is valid. setting download link to ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
        DOWNLOAD_LINK=${DOWNLOAD_URL}
    else        
        echo -e "link is invalid closing out"
        exit 2
    fi
fi

curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o $ARCHIVE_NAME

# Unpack Server zip
# Backup and restore logic for config.json
if [ -f /mnt/server/config.json ]; then
    mv /mnt/server/config.json /mnt/server/config-backup.json
    unzip -o $ARCHIVE_NAME -d /mnt/server
    rm -f /mnt/server/config.json
    mv /mnt/server/config-backup.json /mnt/server/config.json
else
    unzip -o $ARCHIVE_NAME -d /mnt/server
fi
rm -f "$ARCHIVE_NAME"

#Create the Plugins folder
mkdir -p /mnt/server/plugins/


## Install End
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Hogwarp Is Installed!"
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: Hogwarp API Key
variables.description:
A API required to boot - https://presence.hogwarp.com/login
- If not set on install it will fail. Set API Key then Reinstall Files

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: A name that displays on the Hogwarp list

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description:
Max players for a server, this depends on your Patreon level for Hogwarp
https://www.patreon.com/tiltedphoques - ( 4, 8, 16, No Limit ) In that order.

variables.name: Server Icon URL
variables.description: The icon that displays on Hogwarps multiplayer listing

variables.name: Server Description
variables.description: The description that shows on the Multiplayer list

variables.name: Download URL
variables.description: URL to pull the files from - By default this will use my own Repo, so updates may be slow - getting them from the discord is best!

variables.name: Hogwarp Version
variables.description: What version of the Hogwarp server to install, all versions can be found in my Repo under *Versions* within Game-Eggs/Hogwarp

variables.name: Dotnet Version
variables.description: Currently Winetricks is out of date, on .Net, this is a workaround
